#**Introduction**
This project shows interesting findings about the correlation between happiness (rated on a scale from 1-10) and its relationship between various employment sectors in countries around the world. 

Our data was supplied from the [International Labour Organization](http://www.ilo.org/global/research/global-reports/global-employment-trends/2014/WCMS_234879/lang--en/index.htm) and [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/unsdsn/world-happiness).
